recipe.title: Polonaise Topping for Asparagus
ingredients: 1/3 cup fresh bread crumbs, toasted lightly
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley leaves
instructions: In a large skillet heat the butter over moderately high heat until the foam subsides and in it sauté the bread crumbs until they are golden brown. Stir in the egg, the parsley, and salt and pepper to taste and serve the topping over asparagus.
